user_location: of Indie Alehouse Brewing Co. Toronto, Ontario, Canada
review_blob: Nice pale color, great mouthfeel and body, a little funky hop aroma, not sure how intentional this is but its not bad. Could drink a few of these.

user_location: of Indie Alehouse Brewing Co. Toronto, Ontario, Canada
review_blob: As good a beer as Ive ever had. Like other Dogfish head beers my only wish is it had more aroma, but so good. The balance is amazing for a beer this big. Sweet aftertaste is balanced by the incredible hop bite. Far too easy to drink for a 9% beer. Love the toffee and carmel notes in the end.

user_location: of Indie Alehouse Brewing Co. Toronto, Ontario, Canada
review_blob: My go to IPA. Perfectly balanced, only improvement would be in aroma which is faint but pleasantly green, pine and citrus. The balance of body, bitter, sweetness and dryness is exceptional.
